title: RL32794
content: The Committee on House Administration reports an omnibus resolution to cover expenses of standing and select committees for two years. Budget requests include staff salaries, consulting services, printing, office supplies, and travel costs. Some expenses like pension and insurance are paid from other funds. Committee chairs introduce resolutions for funding approval. The Committee on House Administration introduces an omnibus funding resolution for committees in the Congress, with requested and authorized funding levels provided in tables for reference. The omnibus funding resolution for committees in Congress includes tables showing requested and authorized funding levels in constant dollars for multiple Congresses, with absolute and percentage differences calculated.
